articles.content: Moeen Ali has been waiting for this tour. He has been dreaming about it since he felt he had earned his place in the England team. But he never imagined he would be captain when it finally happened. … [+6396 chars]

articles.title: 'Massive blow' - Birmingham City's injury latest after Blues' setback - Birmingham Live

articles.content:
John Eustace has a full fortnight to continue his work with Birmingham City's small squad ahead of Saturday week's clash with Sheffield United.
